content: around neck that isn t covered by beg half_double_crochet slip_stitch down 2nd side till marker and repeat chain 30 with sl sts back to apron cont sl sts to bottom edge of apron then slip_stitch to middle double_crochet of scallop and do a picot before moving on picot in the ctr double_crochet of ea scallop end with slip_stitch into first slip_stitch fasten_off and weave in end steam block and tie around your dish soap bottle
